biotools.summary: The Multi-Domain Genome Recovery v1.0 (MuDoGeR v1.0) framework is a tool developed to help users to recover Metagenome-Assembled Genomes and Uncultivated Viral Genomes from whole-genome sequence (WGS) samples simultaneously. The MuDoGeR v1.0 framework acts as a wrapper for several tools. It was designed to be an easy-to-use tool that outputs ready-to-use comprehensive files.
